mapper.sql: id, quotation_num, rollin_time, inquiry_unit, inquiry_area, organization, return_season
mapper.select:
select COUNT(1) AS total, COUNT(DISTINCT(quotation_num)) AS inqCount, (CASE WHEN return_season IS NULL OR return_season='' THEN "空值" ELSE return_season END ) AS reason from erui_rfq.v_inq_rtn_reason WHERE 1=1
AND rollin_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s")
GROUP BY return_season

select
distinct
from inq_rtn_reason
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into inq_rtn_reason (quotation_num, rollin_time, inquiry_unit, inquiry_area, organization, return_season) values
(#{reason.quotationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason.rollinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reason.inquiryUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason.inquiryArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason.organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason.returnSeason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into inq_rtn_reason (id, quotation_num, rollin_time, inquiry_unit, inquiry_area, organization, return_season) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{quotationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rollinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inquiryUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inquiryArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnSeason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into inq_rtn_reason
id,
quotation_num,
rollin_time,
inquiry_unit,
inquiry_area,
organization,
return_season,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{quotationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rollinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{inquiryUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inquiryArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{returnSeason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update inq_rtn_reason
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
quotation_num = #{record.quotationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rollin_time = #{record.rollinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
inquiry_unit = #{record.inquiryUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inquiry_area = #{record.inquiryArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization = #{record.organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
return_season = #{record.returnSeason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update inq_rtn_reason set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, quotation_num = #{record.quotationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rollin_time = #{record.rollinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, inquiry_unit = #{record.inquiryUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inquiry_area = #{record.inquiryArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization = #{record.organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, return_season = #{record.returnSeason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update inq_rtn_reason
quotation_num = #{quotationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rollin_time = #{rollinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
inquiry_unit = #{inquiryUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inquiry_area = #{inquiryArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
return_season = #{returnSeason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update inq_rtn_reason set quotation_num = #{quotationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rollin_time = #{rollinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, inquiry_unit = #{inquiryUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inquiry_area = #{inquiryArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, return_season = #{returnSeason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
